title: The Learn By Doing Lab Teaching Practicum
description: Early teaching experience in an informal science/technology/engineering/ mathematics (STEM) teaching and learning environment. Principles of inquiry-driven STEM education, lesson design, implementation and assessment. Intended for undergraduates exploring STEM teaching as a career. Total credit limited to 4 units. Credit/No Credit grading only. 1 seminar, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as ENGR 322/SCM 302/HNRS 302.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area B and consent of instructor
